title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘Bond king’ Jeffrey Gundlach predicts our next financial hangover — and it’s sobering
items.description: Easy money was never meant to last forever. Expect a 4% return on cash, 5% on bonds and 6% from stocks.

items.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner is a mooch. How can I protect her?
items.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

items.title: Hasbro’s stock rallies as toy maker ups its revenue forecast for ‘Wizards of the Coast’
items.description: The toy company’s first-quarter results wowed Wall Street, but its outlook excluded any impact of tariffs due to uncertainty over trade negotiations.

items.title: Comcast admits it is ‘not winning’ in fight to stanch broadband subscriber losses
items.description: Comcast has been struggling with falling broadband and cable subscriptions amid a broader industry decline.

items.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders crash GameStop after shoppers report similar bugs at Target, Best Buy and Walmart. Most retailers are out of stock.
items.description: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders went live on Thursday, and gamers are reporting all sorts of issues with the buying process.

items.title: Wall Street is in love with this safe haven, dividend play and sees big returns this year
items.description: Strong first-quarter results from this telecommunications company have analysts confident it can navigate an uncertain macroeconomic environment.

items.title: Hasbro Soars 13.26%: What’s Behind the Surge?
items.description: As of this writing, Hasbro (HAS) shares have gained $6.99 per share or 13.26%, with a current price of $59.68. The toy maker has been making headlines...

items.title: 2 major Wall Street banks love this autonomous driving stock that can withstand trade war
items.description: "We see the tariff risk as manageable and non-US market demand remains strong," Goldman analyst Tina Hou wrote Thursday.

items.title: Bank of America cuts Apple price target on tariff hit, delayed AI rollout
items.description: Apple has also delayed the rollout of Apple Intelligence, its take on AI, several times since 2024.

items.title: Here’s the portfolio allocation that’s held up amid market volatility
items.description: Morningstar found diversified portfolios are beating all-stock and basic 60/40 strategies. Here's how it breaks the allocations down.

items.title: Analysts are hiking their price targets on this software stock after a blowout earnings report
items.description: Shares added about 8% before the market open on Thursday.
